comment._content: Princess Victoria Louise was the only daughter of German Emperor, William II, here is her bio en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Viktoria_Luise_of_Prussia she married Ernest Augustus, Duke of Brunswick, here is his bio: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_Augustus,_Duke_of_Brunswick Duke of Cumberland, in previous photo, is father of the groom.

comment.author: 60920519@N05
comment._content: That's in Karlsruhe, capital of the grand duchy of Baden, in the German Empire. It was the day of the engagement of Princess Viktoria Luise with Princ Ernst August, February 11th 1913; the third person on the photo is Prince Oskar of Prussia (1888–1958), one of Viktoria Luise's six brothers. In the background the grand duke's palace.

comment.author: 60920519@N05
